title: WTB T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait VG-VGEX condition

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait VG-VGEX condition
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone.. 

Im looking to buy a few T206 Red portrait Cobbs.. looking for VG-VGEX condition... PSA or SGC graded.  Interested in SC backs, Piedmont, EPDG, or Carolina Brights. 

Please email me or PM me if you have any for sale..

Jamie
I just traded for a SGC 40 Red Cobb
